function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling and cultivation of bacteriophage MS2 and E. coli C3000 may pose a risk of accidental exposure and infection.","Impact":"Potential infection of laboratory personnel and surrounding environment.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of personal protective equipment (PPE), and proper training on handling infectious agents.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and disinfectants for decontamination.","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and individuals in the surrounding environment.","Owner":"Laboratory management, biosafety officers, and trained personnel."}]}
